links.title: UAW says it will greet Tesla workers with 'open arms'
links.description: The United Automobile Workers union on Friday said it had been approached by workers at Tesla's Fremont, California, assembly plant, rejecting a charge by the chief executive of the luxury electric car maker that a worker who publicly criticized the company was on the UAW payroll.

links.description: Analysts have speculated for years about what Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) could choose to do with its massive $246.1 billion cash balance. In a new report, Baird analyst William Power suggests some aggressive and surprising M&A opportunities that may actually be realistic for Apple. Power suggests Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA), Netflix, Inc.

links.title: Tesla Model S catches fire while sitting in a Toronto garage
links.description: Earlier this month, a Tesla Model S sitting in a Toronto garage ignited and caught on fire. The car was about four months old and was not plugged in to an electric socket, says a source. Fires are a touchy issue for the company, which reports Q4 2013 earnings on February 19th.
